name: Wet Hopped Sly Boogie
description: Wet Hopped Sly Boogie Session IPA is wet-hopped with Centennial Hops grown here at Triton Brewing Company®! This delightful, hoppy IPA is a very small batch and (sadly) when it’s gone, it’s gone. The Wet Hopped Sly will only be available on draft. Sorry no growler fills.
